author: aandvalenzuela
body:
Hopefully the last cleanup for el8!

* Organizing the image in different layers in the same order I found them while building CMMSW.
* Extra layer for dependencies that are needed for old releases and might be cleanup at some point.
* Extra layer for user packages (therefore dropping Dockerfile.user).
* Adding missing `pythonX-psutils` and `pythonX-requests` in runtime image.

FYI, @smuzaffar the packages we discussed this morning are now in (dropping `nss-devel` and `popt-devel` - they are in bootstrap as you mentioned).
title: El8 image cleanup
